alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Coffee; Echols (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 29 at 10:50AM EDT until further notice by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of northern Florida, including the following areas, Gilchrist, Hamilton, Northern Columbia, Southern Columbia and Suwannee. Portions of southeast Georgia, including the following areas, Appling, Atkinson, Bacon, Clinch, Coffee, Echols, Jeff Davis, Northern Ware, Pierce, Southern Ware and Wayne. * WHEN...From late tonight through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Tropical Cyclone Idalia is expected to bring 4 to 8 inches of rain, with locally higher amounts, to the watch area, which may lead to flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
